MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 09:44.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY24 postcode area of Borth, affecting properties in Ynyslas and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 08:36AM to complete urgent repairs. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9:45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:46AM on 12th January 2021
